title: 6 months of being a Freelance UI Designer
description: Looking back 5 years, day dreaming about going freelance, I genuinely never thought Iâ€™d have the guts to do it. But here I sit. Just over 7 months (yes this post has been sitting here for a month or so) since I became a full-time freelance UI designer. Happier than I have been for a long time. The day I made my final decision to hand in my notice to my employer, I had my doubts about a few things. Some the same as I
